mods:originInfo.mods:publisher: Forest Department Sarawak, Malaysia and Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, UK

nomenclature.name: Calamus divaricatus Becc. var. contrarius J.Dransf.
nomenclature.author: J.Dransf.

div.p: Slender montane rattan, similar in all respects to C. divaricatus var. divaricatus but differing in the much smaller leaf, not exceeding 25 cm long, bearing regular, lanceolate close leaflets, not at all divaricate, to 15 x 2 cm.
Known only from G Dulit. Endemic.
C. divaricatus var. contrarius was collected in a shady moss forest near the edge of a cliff ate. 1,200m altitude.
